item.title: Moving My Personal Blog From Wordpress to Hugo
item.description: I started the process of moving my personal blog over a year ago, when the global pandemic brought on by the COVID-19 virus sent my local area into lock down. The reasons for doing so were simple enough, my web hosting bill had grown north of $200 dollars a month for my personal blog. Don’t get me wrong, Wordpress is great! I just wanted to get my blog onto something more appropriate for the audience (read, pretty small).
